name: Necromancer Academy Showdown
description:
Xbox 360 controllers required

Students! Welcome to Necromancer Academy! A place where the pupils become the masters in the art of necromancy.

Once a year there is an epic showdown between the best of the best as pupils are put against each other to test their might and to obtain glory for their schools. Using the power of necromancy, students use their spirits to fight other students in order to achieve victory. 2v2 fights occur, with player and spirit fighting player and spirit.

Fights are all about teamwork and co-operation as players try to co-ordinate in order to try to win through the multiple optional win conditions present in the match. With ghosts and humans having different controls, combos are limitless!

This is Necromancer Academy Showdown!
